CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, October 29, 1955, pg. A17, reads: "AKA's Honor Anderson - The Greene Hearthe [Hearth] was the scene of a reception Saturday (photo above), night for Marian Anderson, honorary soror. Pictured, AKA Sorors Madelyn Cole, Geri Reynolds, Honorary Sorors Marian Anderson and Jessie M. Vann; Sorors Helen Howard of Mound Bayou, Miss., Mary K. Wade and LaRue Frederick. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of eight women, from left: Madelyn Cole, Geri Reynolds, Marian Anderson, Jessie Vann, Helen Howard, Mary K. Wade, and LaRue Frederick posed with Alpha Kappa Alpha ivy leaf shaped sign, in Greene Hearth
CatSubject_tab: Group portraits--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Women--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Alpha Kappa Alpha Sorority.Greene Hearth (Pittsburgh, Pa.)Greek letter societies--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Anderson, Marian, 1897-1993.
